video.title: Lightning Point
video.synopsis: After being stranded in the coastal town of Lightning Point, two alien girls from another galaxy -- Zoey and Kiki -- find an ally in a shy earthling.

episodes.synopsis: When two irrepressible girls from another galaxy, Zoey and Kiki, land in Lightning Point, their dreams of surfing finally come true.
episodes.title: Wipeout

episodes.synopsis: Kiki and Zoey are stranded on Earth. As they're starting to settle in at Amber's house, Zoey catches the eye of surf king Brandon.
episodes.title: Microwave

episodes.synopsis: Zoey and Kiki start attending Amber's school, which is nothing like school on Lumina. Zoey devises a plan to contact home.
episodes.title: Wires Crossed

episodes.synopsis: When Amber's singing moves Kiki to tears, Amber makes an important discovery: Luminans can only experience emotions on Earth.
episodes.title: Feelings

episodes.synopsis: When Kiki finds out that Luca's horse Bandit has become dangerous to ride after her arrival, she feels terrible.
episodes.title: Good Vibrations

episodes.synopsis: Luca and Kiki have been growing closer, and Amber is sick of being stuck in the middle. Finally, Luca asks Kiki out on a date.
episodes.title: Crushed

episodes.synopsis: When Zoey skips cleanup to recharge, Amber and Kiki think nothing of it.  That is, until a burst of lightning strikes their house.
episodes.title: Alien Abduction

episodes.synopsis: When Madison casually challenges Zoey to surf the infamous Lighthouse break with her, Zoey accepts but underestimates the danger involved.
episodes.title: Risky Business

episodes.synopsis: Zoey, Kiki and Amber head out to the Benedict cane field. Zoey is excited and can't wait to show the others the energy anomaly she has found.
episodes.title: The Cane Field

episodes.synopsis: With Luca and Brandon dangerously close to their secret, Kiki feels that she and Zoey have no choice but to find out what they really know.
episodes.title: Circle of Friends

episodes.synopsis: Zoey is sick of waiting and decides to find a way home. Zoey and Amber test out the energy field one more time.
episodes.title: Close Encounter

episodes.synopsis: When a storm is forecast to hit Lightning Point, Zoey and Kiki know it's time. They can send a signal through the lightning back to Lumina.
episodes.title: Kiki Revealed

episodes.synopsis: Kiki and Zoey are anxious. Still without response from Lumina and with Luca knowing their secret, they no longer feel safe in Lightning Point.
episodes.title: Space Ship

episodes.synopsis: Weeks after a boat was discovered in the cane field, no new clues have been found. There is no further message from Lumina.
episodes.title: Distracted

episodes.synopsis: Amber is  excited when her crush, Josh, notices her at school. She's doubly excited when he asks her to help organize a party.
episodes.title: Poles Apart

episodes.synopsis: When Amber's dad unexpectedly returns and invites her to live with him in Hawaii, she's faced with a difficult decision.
episodes.title: Family Ties

episodes.synopsis: When Luca becomes curious about Kiki's alien powers, she wastes no time in showing him some tricks with the plasma card.
episodes.title: Alien Attraction

episodes.synopsis: Until they know more about it, the gang decides not to let Brandon know about the toy lighthouse.
episodes.title: See the Light

episodes.synopsis: When Amber suggests a house party to celebrate the newest couple in Lightning Point, everyone's excited. Everyone, that is, except Madison.
episodes.title: Vanished

episodes.synopsis: Kiki and Zoey are relieved to find out that half-Luminan Brandon can't use the card properly. They decide to destroy the card.
episodes.title: Power Up

episodes.synopsis: With Brandon fully charged, Zoey feels he needs to know the truth about her. How can she be his girlfriend and keep lying to him?
episodes.title: Heartbreak

episodes.synopsis: Brandon is furious with everyone, especially Zoey, for lying to him. How could they keep a secret like this from him?
episodes.title: Connections

episodes.synopsis: The day of the Lightning Point Junior Girls Surfing Competition is here and everyone from Lightning Point is ready to compete ... except Zoey.
episodes.title: Surf's Up

episodes.synopsis: Brandon is so excited by his alien energy that he starts to recharge far too often. As a result, he can't help but radiate energy in the diner.
episodes.title: Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: Brandon is finally ready to learn who he truly is. Zoey becomes more and more convinced that Brandon has secrets locked inside his memories.
episodes.title: Investigation

episodes.synopsis: Amber, Zoey and Kiki go for one last surf. Zoey and Kiki will miss Amber and Lightning Point when they leave for Lumina tonight.
episodes.title: Flight
